section.heading: Grants office; establishment.
section.text: There shall be established within DDOE a grants office that shall have a grants development staff that will support DDOE grant writing efforts by:

para.text: Assisting DDOE programs in grant writing, including providing letters of support to community organizations seeking grants upon request;
Following approval by the Director, or his designee, pursuant to ยง 8-151.07(9) timely submit grant applications and proposals.
